rooms.description: A welcoming open space with minimalistic Scandinavian design, natural light, and storage for coats and shoes.
Spacious living area with large windows facing East for morning light, incorporating Scandinavian simplicity and natural materials.
An open dining space adjacent to the kitchen, designed with a modern minimalist approach emphasizing clean lines.
Fully equipped kitchen with Scandinavian finishes, ergonomic layout for easy movement, and large window to connect with the courtyard.
A private guest room with a Scandinavian aesthetic, en-suite bathroom, and ample natural light.
Multi-purpose room serving as a study or family den with integrated bookshelves and cozy seating.

openings.description: The main entrance is designed to welcome guests, positioned according to Vastu norms favoring South orientation for receiving positive energy.
Strategically placed windows maximize natural light and ventilation while maintaining privacy and adhering to Vastu guidelines.

central_courtyard.description: A landscaped courtyard promoting energy flow and relaxation, featuring water elements and greenery as per Vastu principles.

rooftop_terrace.description: An open-air luxury terrace offering panoramic views of the surroundings with a focus on Scandinavian minimalism.
